title: Corn Maque Choux
requires: Emeril’s Essence  (the recipe is in the Miscellaneous folder).
ingredients: 4 cups corn (about 6 ears of fresh corn)
½ cup chopped red or green bell pepper
instructions: Melt the butter in a large skillet or sauté pan over medium-high heat.  Add the corn, onions, bell pepper, and the jalapeño and cook stirring.  Add the Essence and the salt and continue cooking until soft, about 10 minutes.
Add the cream and continue cooking for an additional 2 minutes.
Remove for the heat and serve hot.
